title: Text to SQL Generator
description: Powered by a locally powered LLM, this simple web application converts natural language queries into SQL queries to provide a simple and straightforward way for users to interact with their databases.

title: End-to-End Machine Learning Pipeline for prediction of Private Property Prices
description: This project covers the entire end-to-end machine learning pipeline, from raw data collection through URA's API to model training and deployment via Docker for containerization and FastAPI at backend.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and a clean design.
